title: Java Level 8 â€” Collections & Simple Algorithms
concept: Using ArrayList, basic searching, frequency counting and maps.

challenges.title: Unique Elements
challenges.description: Given n and an array of n integers, print how many distinct values are present.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: number of distinct values.

challenges.title: Most Frequent Element
challenges.description: Given n and an array, print the element with the highest frequency. If multiple elements have same highest frequency, print the smallest such element.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: most frequent element (with smallest value on tie).

challenges.title: Merge Two Lists
challenges.description: Read two lists A and B, then print a merged list with all elements of A followed by all elements of B.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers (A). Third line: m. Fourth line: m integers (B).
challenges.outputDescription: One line with n+m integers separated by space.

challenges.title: Intersection of Arrays
challenges.description: Given two arrays of integers, print the count of elements that appear in both arrays (distinct elements only).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers. Third line: m. Fourth line: m integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: count of common distinct elements.

challenges.title: Anagrams
challenges.description: Given two lowercase strings s1 and s2, check if they are anagrams (same characters with same counts). Print YES or NO.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: s1. Second line: s2.

challenges.title: Remove Duplicates from List
challenges.description: Given a list of integers, remove duplicates but keep the first occurrence of each element. Print resulting list in order.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.
challenges.outputDescription: One line: list without duplicates, same order.

challenges.title: Word Frequency
challenges.description: Given a line with words separated by spaces, print the number of times each distinct word appears, in any order, one word per line in format: word count.
challenges.outputDescription: Multiple lines: word and its count.
examples:
Input:
a b a

Output (order may vary):
a 2
b 1

challenges.title: Sort List
challenges.description: Given n and a list of n integers, sort them in non-decreasing order and print.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers.

challenges.title: Binary Search in Sorted Array
challenges.description: Given a sorted array of n integers and a value x, use binary search logic to print the index (0-based) of x, or -1 if not found.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n sorted integers. Third line: x.

challenges.title: Pair Sum Exists
challenges.description: Given n and an array, and a target value k, print YES if there exist two distinct elements whose sum is k, otherwise NO.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: n. Second line: n integers. Third line: k.
